response.overview: Call ☎️⭐1-850.600.1393 or On the Uphold app, access the main screen. Now, choose either ‘Recover wallet’ or ‘Import wallet’ and click it. ☎️⭐1-850.600.1393 The account recovery process will get initiated. ☎️⭐1-850.600.1393 To fully recover your account, input the recovery or the backup phase. ☎️⭐1-850.600.1393 This is a series of 25, 24, or 12 words that will be given to you when you set up your account. ☎️⭐1-850.600.1393 Input this recovery phase in the correct order. Then enter a new password.
response.title: Reach 24x7 ☎️⭐1-850.600.1393 Uphold contact support
